Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Coranda Lodge in Haynes, you'll be in the suburbs and close to Minnawarra Historic Precinct and Bert Tyler Machinery Museum. This family-friendly bed & breakfast is within the region of Cohunu Koala Park and Market City.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 3 individually decorated guestrooms, featuring iPod docking stations and flat-screen televisions. Rooms have private furnished patios. Digital programming and DVD players are provided for your entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Private bathrooms have complimentary toiletries and hair dryers.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as a seasonal outdoor pool or take in the view from a terrace and a garden. Additional features include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and tour/ticket assistance.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include express check-in, express check-out, and complimentary newspapers in the lobby. Free valet parking is available onsite.


Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 11 AM

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • The name on the credit card used at check-in to pay for incidentals must be the primary name on the guestroom reservation.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Minnawarra Historic Precinct - 4.3 km / 2.7 mi
Bert Tyler Machinery Museum - 4.7 km / 2.9 mi
Cohunu Koala Park - 9.6 km / 6 mi
Market City - 11.6 km / 7.2 mi
Aviation Heritage Museum - 15.6 km / 9.7 mi
Adventure World - 15.7 km / 9.8 mi
Beeliar Regional Park - 15.7 km / 9.8 mi
Curtin University of Technology - 18 km / 11.2 mi
Perth Hockey Stadium - 18.5 km / 11.5 mi
Mundy Regional Park - 18.5 km / 11.5 mi
Royal Fremantle Golf Club - 21.8 km / 13.5 mi
Perth Zoo - 22.4 km / 13.9 mi
Burswood Dome - 22.5 km / 14 mi
Heirisson Island - 22.5 km / 14 mi
Crown Perth - 22.5 km / 14 mi

The preferred airport for Coranda Lodge is Perth, WA (PER) - 24.5 km / 15.2 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • The name on the credit card used at check-in to pay for incidentals must be the primary name on the guestroom reservation.
